body_html: Looking at the error, it seems like gen_git_source.py is failing on this line, where it tries to run git. Is it possible that git isn't in a directory in your %PATH% environment variable?
body_text: Looking at the error, it seems like gen_git_source.py is failing on this line, where it tries to run git. Is it possible that git isn't in a directory in your %PATH% environment variable?
body: Looking at the error, it seems like `gen_git_source.py` is failing on [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/6dc7f989f10ceb4cc6b19e627ab742e02a0787b7/tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py#L150), where it tries to run `git`. Is it possible that `git` isn't in a directory in your `%PATH%` environment variable?
